title: Hi No Maru Gaisen Otome
alternative_title: Rising Sun Campaign Maiden ; 日之丸街宣女子
status: Rising Sun Campaign Maiden ; 日之丸街宣女子
description:
Description :
        The probably most controversial manga of the year 2015 that has had Leftists foaming at the mouth trying to shut it down:The middle schooler Kanade gets dragged into a political demonstration by her conspiratard childhood friend Sou and discovers that not all is as it seems to be.
